metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1251 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: There is a vulnerability of type use-after-free affecting DBD::mysql (aka DBD-mysql or the Database Interface (DBI) MySQL driver for Perl) 3.x and 4.x before 4.041 when used with mysql_server_prepare=1.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> only an issue with mysql_server_prepare=1, which is not the default.

criterions.comment: libdbd-mysql-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
